short_summary: Lowest price for a Forklift Truck from a supplier holding a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A
description: Natural Resource Canada has a requirement for a Forklift Truck. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities?words=E60HS-21FRKL
duration_in_months: If bid is successful, contract term can be up to 2 months (1 month duration of the anticipated date range for closure) with an optional 2 extension month in case of an extension,
full_summary:
------------------

### Forklift Truck Tender Announcement

**Title:** Forklift Truck

**Reference Number:** cb-5708-30875436

**Publication Date:** May 19, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2023, 14:00:00

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** None

**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada

**Regions of Delivery:** Canada

### Opportunity Details

Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN) is seeking a supplier to provide a Forklift Truck.

### Eligibility Requirements

The bid solicitation process is restricted to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) E60HS-21FRKL/A. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified under this RFSO can visit [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities?words=E60HS-21FRKL) for more information.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this RFP, please contact:

Anik Samson
E-Mail: [anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-408-3462

### Tender Documents

You can view the tender notice and all supporting documents by visiting [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche?words=E60HS-21FRKL).

Please note that all tender submissions must be made through the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) portal. To be considered, bid submissions must be received by the closing date.
